message: Take it or leave it, Bob! You'll be left with nothing if you don't accept.
Not quite fair enough, Bob! I'll make a better offer next round.
You'll get a smaller share this time, Bob. Don't expect any more generosity from me!
I'm not going to give up yet, Alice. Let's try again!
You're getting closer, Bob, but I'm not there yet. I want more!
You're running out of time, Bob. Don't expect me to go any lower!
I'm not giving up yet! Let's try to find a fair split, Alice!
Fine, Bob. We'll split it 50-50. I'm not going to wait any longer.
